ru: Прогнитесь в пояснице, в грудном отделе и в шейном чтобы позвоночник растягивался.

enSynonyms: Look forward with a steady gaze.
Gently align your eyes towards the horizon.
Turn your eyes forward with intention.
Fix your gaze softly in front of you.
Let your eyes rest forward, steady and calm.
Face forward and align your line of sight.
Keep your vision clear and pointed ahead.
